Keywords: Avengers , Dark Avengers , Latveria , Soldier , Thunderbolts
Real Name: John Walker
Special Powers
DOOM'S AVENGERS: Other friendly characters with Avengers team ability have Minions of Doom team ability.
MY DINNER WAS TOUGHER THAN YOU!: Energy Shield/Deflection, Invincible.
NO MAN LEFT BEHIND, SOLDIER!: Leadership. When U.S. Agent uses it, if a friendly character was KO'd since your last turn he succeeds on all results except a 1.

It rare for a clix these days, that is over 50 points, To not have 3 damage on all clix. Or an ability that ups damage/BCF/Exploit. So on clix 4 and 5, he can't even hurt most clix anymore. Other than that I really like his Dooms avengers. Mix him with Morgana and start building an alternative avengers team!

Novashotgunner
John here is really cool. he's no D+ prime but for a comic version of U.S.Agent he's a fine representaion. He makes every Avengers team from here on out for me! The leadership will be a fun combo with his prime counter part letting friendlies die in but ultimately coming out on top because of it. The wildest part is wizkids doubled the amount of John Walkers in clix in a single year so as a fan of the character I couldn't be more happy!
